item.description:
Hello again, members!

Here's hoping you can join us for a great time, for a great cause!

Visit http://www.whiskerwalk.org for all the details, including the vendors, events, raffles, contests, demonstrations, directions and more!

Sponsors, if there is anything you'd like to donate for goodie bags, or raffle items, reply to this email and/or ship to NEBBC, c/o Cassie-Leigh Stock, 182 Hayden Rowe Street, Apartment Four, Hopkinton, MA 01748.

If you are interested in volunteering, please let me know.  We will be setting up much earlier in the morning...

Can't wait!

Cassie-Leigh Stock, President & Founder

www.nebbc.org
item.how_to_find_us: Blue sign on our NEBBC tent and our kiddie/canine swimming pool!
item.why: This will be our 2nd year at Sterling Animal Shelter's Whisker Walk, manning our booth, increasing membership, promoting responsible dog ownership by demonstrating with our bullies, handing out literature, and having fun! Join us!
item.name: Whisker Walk 2011!
